ygData.subject: Hi! I would like to introduce myself
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! I just wanted to introduce myself. I play Tikha D Ombrenoire on Mithaniel Marr.  She is a 21st level Erudite Cleric.  I also have a secondary character
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! I just wanted to introduce myself.

I play Tikha D'Ombrenoire on Mithaniel Marr. She is a 21st level Erudite
Cleric. I also have a secondary character called Gabriella on the same
server. She is a level 3 wood elf bard. I just started her recently, but
spend most of my time playing my main char Tikha.

In RL I am 30 years old and married. I have a 4 year old daughter. My
husband and I both play EQ and love it! We both have a computer and we have
two ASDN connections to the internet in our home, so most of the time we
play together. We have made many friends in EQ and are still making new
ones everyday. It is funny cause lots of guys like flirting with Tikha, but
if/when they find out that Imaaj (my husband's character) is being played by
my RL husband they don't seem to always know how to react. Tikha has a love
in EQ though. His name is Oadn. Whenever Imaaj seems to show any signs of
jealousy, Oadn just tells Imaaj that they will have to duel it out. They
get lots of kicks and laughs out of the situation. My husband is ok with
the whole idea of my roleplaying a relationship on EQ. He is not the type
to be lovey with his character and knows that I enjoy the companionship in
game that Oadn brings. Imaaj thinks of Oadn as one of his best hunting
partners. Oadn and Imaaj often hunt together even when Tikha isn't online.
Besides, it seems that Imaaj is waiting for Gabriella to grow up a bit so
that he can start courting her ;-) He really loves female wood elves!!!

I am looking forward to creating a char on Brell and meeting with the rest
of you. Is there a meeting time each week, or is there another planned
meeting soon? How do I go about joining the guild once I have created a
character on Brell?
